description:
In this ToP Tip series, I'm sharing some of my favourite paint recipes. Find out how I painted the dingy red of my Gallowdark Space Hulk corridors with these three visual painting guides.

The post ToP Tip: 3 quick guides for painting Gallowdark Space Hulk terrain appeared first on Tale of Painters.
title: ToP Tip: 3 quick guides for painting Gallowdark Space Hulk terrain
